tasks.task: Design and implement a water distribution system considering elevation changes on property.
subtasks: Assess elevation changes in the property.
Identify a spring source at the bottom of the property.
Plan water conveyance from the spring to higher elevations using gravity.
Install necessary infrastructure to store water at upper elevations.

tasks.task: Explore small-scale hydroelectric generation using gravity-fed water systems.
subtasks: Design a two-inch PVC pipeline for nighttime water flow.
Integrate a hydroelectric plant into the pipeline for power generation.
Schedule power usage to utilize daytime and nighttime generation efficiently.

tasks.task: Enhance irrigation capabilities to support potential herd expansion.
subtasks: Consider extending irrigation coverage to more areas.
Adjust herd management practices based on available water resources.
